description: Exeter City fight back from 4-1 down to draw 4-4 in a thrilling League One clash with Crawley Town at St James Park.
title: League One: Exeter City 4-4 Crawley Town
title_page: League One: Exeter City 4-4 Crawley Town - BBC Sport
maintext:
Exeter City have won each of their last two Football League games against Crawley Town and will be looking to record three victories in succession for the first time in this fixtureâ€™s history.
Crawley Town have lost just two of their last seven away Football League games against Exeter City (W2 D3), though both defeats have come across their last two visits to St James Park via 2-1 scorelines.
When playing their final Football League game of the year at St James Park, Exeter have won just two of their last such 15 matches (D9 L4), keeping just one clean sheet in that time.
Crawley have lost each of their last two final Football League games of the year, with both matches coming away from home against Stevenage in 2022 (3-1) and MK Dons in 2023 (2-0).
